build.buildCommand: composer install --no-interaction --prefer-dist --optimize-autoloader --no-dev && npm ci && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache && chmod -R 775 storage bootstrap/cache && php artisan storage:link || true && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
